titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Cyproconazole Technical.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/24/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on Cyproconazole Technical - [Alpha-(4-Chlorophenyl)-alpha-(1-cyclopropylethyl)-1H-1-1,2,4-triazole-1-ethanol.
